document_data.name: Dance of the Unicorns
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dance of the unicorns''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] used by specialty priests devoted to [[Lurue]] called [[Silvermaid]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed the recipient to ''[[teleport without error]]'' to any location within {{SI|1080|ft}}, including up to {{SI|250|lb|k}} of equipment, every minute for six minutes. The movement of the teleport could occur whenever the recipient wanted, making it resembled the ''[[blink]]'' spell.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as [[material component]]s the priestess's [[holy symbol]] and a vial of clear water from a river stirred by a [[unicorn]]'s horn to cast.
